params._platformFee: The fee that will be charged by the platform for using the FairFund platform

params._fundingToken: The token that will be used to fund the proposals
params._maxRequestableAmount: The maximum amount that can be requested by a single proposal from the funding vault
params._minRequestableAmount: The minimum amount that can be requested by a single proposal from the funding vault
params._tallyDate: The date when the voting will end and the proposals will be tallied
params._votingToken: The token that will be used to vote on the proposals

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._platformFee: The new platform fee percentage to be set (i.e. 1 for 1% of amount every proposal will get.)

params.token: The address of the token to withdraw

updatePlatformFee(uint256).notice: Modifies the platform fee (only callable by the owner)

withdrawPlatformFee(address).notice: Withdraws the accumulated platform fees to a specified recipient (only callable by the owner)
